sentences: SBSTA Chair Dovland (Norway) opened the meeting and called on delegates to develop text on as many issues as possible in accordance with the Buenos Aires Plan of Action.
The G-77/CHINA stressed the need to negotiate the issues as a package and said the outcome should be a balanced set of decisions.
He called on Annex II Parties to commit specific financial resources for technology transfer and capacity building by COP-6.
enb_long_title: TWELFTH SESSION OF THE SUBSIDIARY BODIES OF THE UNFCCC
